sentence.Network_en: An old woman sculling a coracle came alongside.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个老妇人划着科拉科尔小艇靠岸了。

sentence.Network_en: I sprang to my feet, and leaped, stamping the coracle under water.
sentence.Network_cn: 我纵身一跳, 将小筏子踩到了水中.

sentence.Network_en: The current was bearing coracle and schooner southward at an equal rate.
sentence.Network_cn: 急流正以同样的速度将小筏子和西斯潘尼奥拉号一起冲向南方.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思真题词汇_百度文库 ... bolivia 玻利维亚（拉丁美洲） coracle 小圆舟 reed 芦苇，芦笛，簧片.

and when , at last , I shouldered the coracle , and groped my way stumblingly out of the hollow where I had supped , there were but two points visible on the whole anchorage .当我扛起小筏子跌跌撞撞地摸索着走出我吃晚饭的洼地时，整个锚地只有两处亮光。
苦力,小工 coracle n. 轻便小舟 coroner n. 验尸官 corpulence n. 肥胖,臃肿 cottonwood n. 『植物』三叶杨 countersink vt. 钻孔装埋,打埋头孔于 countryside.
coraciomorphae 佛法僧形区, coracle 小渔艇, coracle 兽皮小渔船

RelatedPhrase.word: The men were out fishing in their coracles

list.key: The men were out fishing in their coracles
list.abs: ...英国一种小船，呈圆形，骨架由柳木做成，外层为动物的皮，并涂上焦油防水。卷四：The men were out fishing in their coracles一种麻绳。在大航海时代常用到，为防腐烂，需在外涂上焦油。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Welsh corwgl, cwrwgl, related to Scottish Gaelic and Irish curach 'small boat'; compare with currach

entry.tran: 科拉科尔小艇（指旧时一种圆形小划艇，用柳条编成并覆有兽皮）
entry.def: In former times, a coracle was a simple round rowing boat made of woven sticks covered with animal skins.

means.word_mean: 1. a small rounded boat made of hides stretched over a wicker frame; still used in some parts of Great Britain
